question.body: What is one of the advantages to having a convergent arrangement of muscle fibers?

multiple_choice.choice: This arrangement allows the muscle fibers to shorten into a large bulge.
This arrangement allows the muscle to expand and contract in a circular way
This arrangement contains more muscle fibers and can produce more tension while only slightly pulling on their tendons.
This arrangement of motor units the can be stimulated in different, smaller areas that can change the direction of the pull.

response.feedback: Incorrect. The fibers would be in a parallel arrangement to cause this type of action.
Incorrect. The fibers would be in a circular arrangement for this type of motion.
Incorrect. The fibers would be arranged in a pennate or feather shape for this action.
Correct. The fibers would be arranged in a convergent attachment for this type of action.

question.body: What type of muscle arrangement allows you to whistle?

response.feedback: Incorrect. Parallel arrangement allows for movement like lifting your forearm.
Correct. Contraction of the sphincter muscle orbicularis oris allows you to pucker your lips to whistle.
Incorrect. Contraction of different parts of a convergent muscle allows changes in direction.
Incorrect. The feather shaped pennate fasicles do not pull their tendons very far.
